pradhana shishya thibbatuwawe shri siddhartha buddharakkhitha mahimiyan diwithiya shishya daramitipola dhammarakkhitha ginigathpitiye sangharakkhitha morathota dhammakkhandha, rambaukwalle dhammarakkhitha aadi himiwarunta wena wenama malwathu maha wiharaya thulama aawasa sadawa ee samanga eda siyamen wadi bhikshun wahanselata poyamalu wiharayeth mema malwathu wiharayeth aawasa pahasukam salaswa eki sthana sambandhakota lankawe wiwidha palathwalin idakadam puja karamin anuradhapura yugaye patan pawathi bhikshungen eki rajamaha wiharasthana ee ee pansala walata sambandha karamin shasanaya chirathkalayak akhandawa pawathwagena yamata waliwita saranankara sangharaja mahimiyange ha upali mahimiyange upades paridi katayuthu salaswimata hakiwima nisama malwathu maha wiharaya menma asgiri maha wiharayeda bhikshun wahanse chirasthayi wuha.

tharuniyan paharagena yamata yodaganna waidyawariyata ayath motar rathayada polisiya wisin athadanguwata gena atha.mathara, kakanadura pradeshaye padinchi tharunayek ha akurassa pitabaddara pradeshaye padinchi tharuniyak mathara thanayama pitupasa muhudu werale pemsuwa windimin sita atha.mema awasthawe ihatha ki sakakaru ema sthanayata pamina ohu polis parikshakawarayaku bawa pawasa me sthanawala ashobhana lesa hasirima waradak bawa pawasa mathara polisiyata genayamata ohuge motar rathayata nangina lesa danwa atha.ee anuwa me pem yuwala motar rathayata godawu pasu dumriya pola asalata padawagena pamina athi sakakaru tharunayata motar rathayen basa pitupasa nobala duwana lesa danwa tharuniya ragena thangalla pradeshaye palu sthanayakata gena gos dushanaya kara atha.
